explanation: Marcus claims he left at 7 PM and drove to pick up his daughter from soccer practice at Westfield Park. But Clue 3 reveals that Westfield Park's youth soccer practice only runs Monday, Wednesday, and Saturday -- not Thursday. Marcus lied about where he went after 7 PM. Clue 1 shows someone re-entered the building at 9:50 PM, and Marcus, as Operations Manager enforcing the clean-desk policy, had both motive and after-hours access to rearrange Brian's desk.
funFact: Studies show left-handed people make up about 10% of the population, and having your desk set up wrong can reduce productivity by up to 20%.
